Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 11200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g3' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 92.03 config.beamcenterz = 95.29 config.drive()
